description: R.E.P.O. is a co-op sci-fi horror game developed by Semiwork, where players act as intergalactic repo agents sent to recover assets from abandoned or dangerous locations. Teams must work together to locate objectives, avoid or survive hostile entities, and extract safely before time runs out. The game utilizes REPOBUNDLE files within its ecosystem to package and distribute content, streamlining the game's file management and facilitating updates or mod installations.
